text: VOICEOVER: Previously, on MasterChef Australia...

from way back in Season 1.
And this time, there was so much riding on it.

to sort of push you down to the bottom two.

conquered them all...
Perfetto.

Tonight...
MAX: I'm trying not to let myself freak out right now.
the patissier of pain...
..will send someone into a flap.

Julie,
is there something in there that's a little bit comfortable?
